rukus.text: He imandarasakala! Jumu'ara dina yetiya chalatara babe ahbana karaa haya, tetiya tomaloke allahara smaranara phale dharaita horaa arau beca-kina bandha karaa. E'itorae tomalokara babe sarbottama, yadi tomaloke upalabdhi karaa

Tara pichata chalata samapta haâ€™le tomaloke prthiraita prasaraita hai yoraa arau allahara anugraha sandhana karaa lagate allahaka bechi bechi smarana karaa, yate tomaloke saphalata arjana karaiba paraa

Arau sihamte yetiya byarasaya athaba kraira-kautuka dekha paya tetiya sihamte tomaka thiya arasthate'i raakhi se'iphale dharaita haya. Koraa, allahara ocarata yi ache seya kraira-kautuka arau byarasaya-banijyatakaiyo utkrsta; arau allaha sarbasraestha jiraikadata
